item.description:
Organizer: Eileen
<<>>
Also please do not RSVP here if you have already RSVPd on another Meet up site.
You are cordially invited to attend the Kanegis Gallery Holiday Social and Dinner for all meet up members and friends.
The day begins with an open house starting at Noon through 5pm. Feel free to come in check out the gallery, mingle with some of our 300+ members and maybe check out the ocean side shops of Rockport. At 5pm we will take a short walk to the "Fish Shack on the Ocean". Where we will dine on a freshly prepared dinner for our group in a private setting. (Menu choices below).
Many of the board are planning to stay over night or for the whole weekend. We are currently pulling together a list of places to stay and will post ASAP.
Please RSVP "Yes" now! In the comments section please note if you will be attending the Gallery and Dinner, or just the Kanegis Gallery portion of the day. If you are looking to carpool please also add that to your RSVP.
If you know for sure that you want to go and want dinner please click the pay-pal link and make your payment for $35.09 now. (This includes Social Mixer at Kanegis Gallery, wine & cheese party and dinner from menu below. Everything except lodging - what a deal!).
We have been working hard behind the scenes to make this event a huge success. It now up to you!
Please RSVP today.
Thanks, Eileen & your Board of Directors
Choice of meals:
All meals start with chowder choice of: - Clam - Corn
Entr√©es choice of: - Baked Haddock (comes with potato and veggie) - Stuffed Chicken (comes with potato and veggie) - Lobster (Lobster comes with potato)
Includes desert.
Includes only non-alcohol drink (cash bar separate).
Tax and gratuity included.
RSVP TODAY!!
item.name: Holiday Event: Kanegis Gallery Rockport, MA.
